DataElement.preferredName: Periapical Radiograph Diagnostic Imaging Repeat Received Yes No Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A yes/no indicator related to the receiving duplicated evaluations of the radiographic film at or around the apex of the root of a tooth.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Periapical Radiograph Diagnostic Imaging Repeat Received
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the receiving duplicated evaluations of the radiographic film at or around the apex of the root of a tooth.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: At or around the apex of the root of a tooth.:An image produced on a radiosensitive surface by x-ray radiation that has penetrated and passed through a structure.:Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation..

Concepts.definition: At or around the apex of the root of a tooth.
An image produced on a radiosensitive surface by x-ray radiation that has penetrated and passed through a structure.
Any method that uses a visual display of structural or functional patterns of organs or tissues for diagnostic evaluation.

Property.preferredDefinition: Two or more adjacent copies of an identical pattern.:Received; taken, gotten, or acquired.

Concepts.definition: Two or more adjacent copies of an identical pattern.
To take, accept, or get something offered.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the process of identifying a disease by the signs and symptoms (NCI Glossary).

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.28 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. aj

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.
